Name: Tibber
Posts:
['We are teaming up with @polestarcars to make it even smarter to own an electric car!

Now Tibber customers owning a Polestar and a wallbox that can be integrated to the Tibber app are able to easily smart charge their car.

Smart charging is one of Tibber’s most appreciated features by which we charge users’ EVs when the electricity price is at its lowest – fully automatic.

 #tibber #jointheelectricrevolution #EV #electriccar #chargingcar #polestarcars']
